name: What/Who/Where/Why/How
description:
CONTENT WARNINGS: Body horror, cannibalism, and emetophobia are featured within this game. Stay safe, okay?

There's someone in a situation. But what the hell is going on?  Go down four separate branches to find the answers to what, who, where, why, and how.

Made this for a project and thought I might as well post it publicly as well. It's also because the character(s) featured here are ocs of mine that I've talked about a bit online anyways.
